name: Everlight City
description:
~ Currently in development, this is an alpha build. ~

Game will release in January 2023

In Everlight City you play as Neona Herin, a 19yr old student. You live the simple life with your brother, 28yr old Keyron Herin, in the uptown district. Everything changes when Keyron fails to return home one day. Keyron’s disappearance and the Authorities’ lack of interest in the case doesn’t sit right with Neona, and you decide to take things into your own hands, ends you down a path of discovery.

Development stage: Alpha 0.4
